languages.text: "Сейчас трибунал наверняка интересует вопрос — каковы же истинные намерения династии фон Валанциус? Вольный Торговец утверждает, что все это время вел{mf||а} войну с темными эльдарами. Однако... была ли война на самом деле? Или это очередной хорошо поставленный спектакль?" {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас пристально, почти не моргая.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Сейчас трибунал наверняка интересует вопрос — каковы же истинные намерения династии фон Валанциус? Вольный Торговец утверждает, что все это время вел{mf||а} войну с темными эльдарами. Однако... была ли война на самом деле? Или это очередной хорошо поставленный спектакль?" {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас пристально, почти не моргая.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "At this point, the tribunal probably wants to know what the true intentions of the von Valancius dynasty are. The Rogue Trader claims {mf|he|she} has been waging war against the Drukhari this entire time. Except... was there really a war? Or was it another carefully staged performance?" {n}Heinrix is looking at you closely, almost without blinking.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Сейчас трибунал наверняка интересует вопрос — каковы же истинные намерения династии фон Валанциус? Вольный Торговец утверждает, что все это время вел{mf||а} войну с темными эльдарами. Однако... была ли война на самом деле? Или это очередной хорошо поставленный спектакль?" {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас пристально, почти не моргая.{/n}

The Rogue Trader claims {mf|he|she} has been waging war against the Drukhari this entire time. Except... was there really a war? Or was it another carefully staged performance?" {n}Heinrix is looking at you closely, almost without blinking.{/n}

languages.text: « À ce stade, la cour souhaiterait probablement connaître les véritables intentions de la dynastie von Valancius. Le libre-marchand prétend avoir mené une guerre contre les Drukharis pendant tout ce temps. Seulement... était-ce vraiment le cas ? Ou s'agissait-il d'une nouvelle mise en scène soigneusement orchestrée ? » {n}Heinrix vous regarde attentivement, presque sans ciller.{/n}
languages.original_text: "At this point, the tribunal probably wants to know what the true intentions of the von Valancius dynasty are. The Rogue Trader claims {mf|he|she} has been waging war against the Drukhari this entire time. Except... was there really a war? Or was it another carefully staged performance?" {n}Heinrix is looking at you closely, almost without blinking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « À ce stade, la cour souhaiterait probablement connaître les véritables intentions de la dynastie von Valancius. Le libre-marchand prétend avoir mené une guerre contre les Drukharis pendant tout ce temps. Seulement... était-ce vraiment le cas ? Ou s'agissait-il d'une nouvelle mise en scène soigneusement orchestrée ? » {n}Heinrix vous regarde attentivement, presque sans ciller.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “到了这一步，法庭或许想调查清楚，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的真正意图究竟是什么。行商浪人声称，这段时间他一直都在与黑暗灵族开战。不过……他们真的开战了吗？还是说，这仅仅是精心编排的表演而已？”{n}海因里希正目不转睛地盯着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "At this point, the tribunal probably wants to know what the true intentions of the von Valancius dynasty are. The Rogue Trader claims {mf|he|she} has been waging war against the Drukhari this entire time. Except... was there really a war? Or was it another carefully staged performance?" {n}Heinrix is looking at you closely, almost without blinking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “到了这一步，法庭或许想调查清楚，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的真正意图究竟是什么。行商浪人声称，这段时间他一直都在与黑暗灵族开战。不过……他们真的开战了吗？还是说，这仅仅是精心编排的表演而已？”{n}海因里希正目不转睛地盯着你。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「現時点で法廷が知りたいのはフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の真意であろう。自由開拓者はこれまでずっとデュカーリに対して戦争をおこなってきたと主張している。ただ…本当に戦争はあったのか？それとも入念に演出された芝居だったのだろうか？」{n}ハインリックスはまばたきもせず、じっとあなたを見ている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "At this point, the tribunal probably wants to know what the true intentions of the von Valancius dynasty are. The Rogue Trader claims {mf|he|she} has been waging war against the Drukhari this entire time. Except... was there really a war? Or was it another carefully staged performance?" {n}Heinrix is looking at you closely, almost without blinking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「現時点で法廷が知りたいのはフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の真意であろう。自由開拓者はこれまでずっとデュカーリに対して戦争をおこなってきたと主張している。ただ…本当に戦争はあったのか？それとも入念に演出された芝居だったのだろうか？」{n}ハインリックスはまばたきもせず、じっとあなたを見ている。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "An dieser Stelle möchte das Tribunal bestimmt wissen, was die wahren Absichten der Dynastie von Valancius sind. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} behauptet, dass {mf|er|sie} die ganze Zeit lang Krieg gegen die Drukhari geführt habe. Aber ... herrschte überhaupt Krieg? Oder handelt es sich wieder um eine sorgfältige Inszenierung?" {n}Heinrix beobachtet genau, fast ohne dabei zu blinzeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "At this point, the tribunal probably wants to know what the true intentions of the von Valancius dynasty are. The Rogue Trader claims {mf|he|she} has been waging war against the Drukhari this entire time. Except... was there really a war? Or was it another carefully staged performance?" {n}Heinrix is looking at you closely, almost without blinking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "An dieser Stelle möchte das Tribunal bestimmt wissen, was die wahren Absichten der Dynastie von Valancius sind. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} behauptet, dass {mf|er|sie} die ganze Zeit lang Krieg gegen die Drukhari geführt habe. Aber ... herrschte überhaupt Krieg? Oder handelt es sich wieder um eine sorgfältige Inszenierung?" {n}Heinrix beobachtet genau, fast ohne dabei zu blinzeln.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «A estas alturas, seguramente el tribunal quiera saber cuáles son las verdaderas intenciones de la dinastía Von Valancius. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente afirma haber estado librando una guerra contra los Drukhari todo este tiempo. Pero... ¿era realmente una guerra? ¿O se trataba de otra farsa pergeñada con intención de engañarnos?». {n}Heinrix te mira atentamente, casi sin pestañear.{/n}
languages.original_text: "At this point, the tribunal probably wants to know what the true intentions of the von Valancius dynasty are. The Rogue Trader claims {mf|he|she} has been waging war against the Drukhari this entire time. Except... was there really a war? Or was it another carefully staged performance?" {n}Heinrix is looking at you closely, almost without blinking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «A estas alturas, seguramente el tribunal quiera saber cuáles son las verdaderas intenciones de la dinastía Von Valancius. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente afirma haber estado librando una guerra contra los Drukhari todo este tiempo. Pero... ¿era realmente una guerra? ¿O se trataba de otra farsa pergeñada con intención de engañarnos?». {n}Heinrix te mira atentamente, casi sin pestañear.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bu noktada jüri üyeleri muhtemelen von Valancius hanedanlığının gerçek niyetlerinin neler olduğunu merak ediyordur. Hür Tacir'in iddiası, bu süre zarfında Drukharilerle savaş hâlinde olduğu yönünde. Gerçekten bir savaş var mıydı ama? Yoksa bu da özenle tertip edilmiş bir tiyatro muydu?" {n}Heinrix seni neredeyse gözlerini hiç kırpmadan izliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "At this point, the tribunal probably wants to know what the true intentions of the von Valancius dynasty are. The Rogue Trader claims {mf|he|she} has been waging war against the Drukhari this entire time. Except... was there really a war? Or was it another carefully staged performance?" {n}Heinrix is looking at you closely, almost without blinking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu noktada jüri üyeleri muhtemelen von Valancius hanedanlığının gerçek niyetlerinin neler olduğunu merak ediyordur. Hür Tacir'in iddiası bu süre zarfında Drukharilerle savaş hâlinde olduğu yönünde. Bir savaş gerçekten var mıydı ama? Yoksa bu da özenle tertip edilmiş bir tiyatro oyunu muydu?" {n}Heinrix seni, gözlerini neredeyse hiç kırpmadan, yakından izliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
